name: Cosmos oriON! Beyond The Limit
description:
In Cosmos oriON! (Beyond The Limit), the player will take the role of PiPi, a famous treasure hunter in the galaxy. His adventure consists of hoping from planet to planet to collect valuable treasures and minerals.

Genre

3D Space Shooter

Goal

Collect all the materials before running out of fuel!

Controls

Movement:

  • WASD - move/strafe
  • Ctrl / Space - Hover Up / Hover Down

Shooting:

  • Left Mouse Click - Left Gun
  • Right Mouse Click - Right Gun
  • Middle Click - Laser Gun

Shield:

  • F - Generate shield

Note: The game is in development build, you may close the debug console.
